title: Heart of the Hurricane
description: Past & present collide when after a recent divorce, Niki retreats to a cottage in Nova Scotia that she inherited from her grandmother Eliza and great aunt Johanna. With her teenage daughter Melissa in tow, Niki struggles with decisions of what to do next and whether or not an entire career change is in order. At the cottage, she discovers her grandmotherâ€™s diary and is whisked back into the past, into Eliza and Johanna's world during the Great August Gales of Nova Scotia, casting a light on her own life she never saw coming.
author: May Woodworth
